drinks.name: Muscat Massavra Tauride
drinks.description: White semi-sweet Ukrainian wine Aquavintex Pin Blanc Del Mar from Pinot Blanc grapes

additionalDescription.description: In the production of Chateau Lafite Rothschild wine, grapes of Cabernet Sauvignon (93%) and Merlot (7%) were used in the 2000 harvest. The relatively early growing season with temperatures above average and normal rainfall characterized the season this year.The rains in late May and early June made the vines vulnerable to mold, but the farm technicians carefully looked after the vines. July was successful, and the hot dry weeks in August and September resulted in the harvesting of very ripe grapes.
additionalDescription.producer: Chateau Lafite Rothschild, a French winery, is located in Poyac, Medoc, Bordeaux. It belongs to the category First Crewe, that is, to the highest category in this classification and is among the five best producers of Bordeaux wines. The first mention of the farm dates from 1234, and is described as a medieval feudal estate of the early 13th century.

Taster: Very dark color with shades of purple. The aromas are luxurious and exciting, both powerful and extremely delicate, with a fine tannic texture and aftertaste.
Before tasting, it is desirable to decant the drink 2 -3 hours before serving. This process will help him to calm down a little and smooth the tannins slightly.
notes.Sommelier: Before tasting, it is desirable to decant the drink 2 -3 hours before serving. This process will help him to calm down a little and smooth the tannins slightly.
notes.Restaurateur: It is recommended to serve veal, beef, game under berry sauce and ripe cheeses. Flow temperature 16-18 ° C.

additionalDescription.video: <iframe width='100%' height='100%' src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/7pMI3c-_zUA' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture' allowfullscreen></iframe>
additionalDescription.сomments: Login or register to post comments

drinks.description: White semi-sweet Ukrainian wine Aquavintex Pin Blanc Del Mar from Pinot Blanc grapes

additionalDescription.description: The description is being prepared for publication

drinks.name: Muscat Massavra Tauride
drinks.description: White semi-sweet Ukrainian wine Aquavintex Pin Blanc Del Mar from Pinot Blanc grapes

description: Серия рождена в процессе сотрудничества винокурни Макаллан с ювелирным домом Лалик, основным еще в конце 19 века. Творческая составляющая и стремление к прекрасному переданы в каждом изделии Lalique.

The Macallan in Lalique является одной из самых дорогих серий виски в мире. Эту коллекцию можно по истине считать произведением искусства. В линейку вошли экземпляры 50, 55, 57, 60, 62 и 65-летней выдержки. Дегустировать любой напиток из вышеуказанной линейки - настоящее наслаждение.
additionalDescription.сomments: Login or register to post comments

July was successful, and the hot dry weeks in August and September resulted in the harvesting of very ripe grapes.

Before tasting, it is desirable to decant the drink 2 -3 hours before serving. This process will help him to calm down a little and smooth the tannins slightly.
